event.title: California Academy of Sciences - Discovery Tidepool

location.name: California Academy of Sciences
location.address: 55 Music Concourse Drive, San Francisco, CA 94118

event.description: Hands-on exploration of a living tidepool with touchable sea stars, anemones, and hermit crabs. Perfect for young learners to discover marine life in a safe, guided environment.

events.reasoning: Indoor activity with interactive learning perfect for Apollo (4.5 years) and Athena (2.5 years). Stroller-accessible facility, free for infants under 2, and located close to Mission Bay. Weekend timing works great for family schedules.

event.title: Children's Creativity Museum - Imagination Lab
event.description: Interactive workshops where kids create animations, music videos, and digital art. Designed specifically for ages 2-12 with age-appropriate activities.

events.reasoning: Highly rated for toddlers and preschoolers, fully indoor (weather-proof), and very close to home. Offers creative digital experiences that engage both Apollo and Athena at their developmental levels.

event.title: Golden Gate Park Playground & Carousel

location.name: Koret Children's Quarter
location.address: Bowling Green Drive, San Francisco, CA 94122

event.description: San Francisco's oldest public playground featuring slides, swings, climbing structures, and a historic carousel. Wide pathways perfect for strollers.

events.reasoning: Free outdoor option (weather permitting) with classic playground equipment ideal for active toddlers. Carousel adds special experience. Completely stroller-friendly. Medium weather risk due to outdoor location.

event.title: SF Zoo - Little Paws Children's Area

location.name: San Francisco Zoo
location.address: Sloat Boulevard & Great Highway, San Francisco, CA 94132

event.description: Interactive children's area with farm animals, educational exhibits, and a playground. Stroller-friendly paths throughout the zoo.

events.reasoning: Great animal encounters for kids, but farther from Mission Bay (9.8 miles). Partially outdoor so weather could be a factor. Free for infants and offers engaging experiences for both kids.

event.title: Randall Museum - Toddler Time
event.description: Free toddler-focused program with crafts, songs, and stories. Indoor facility with live animals and hands-on science activities.

events.reasoning: Completely free, age-appropriate programming specifically for toddlers. Indoor setting eliminates weather concerns. Shorter duration (1 hour) perfect for young attention spans.
